name: Cse-iii-
body:
# Welcome to the CSE-III- wiki!

This is a guide for anyone who is interested in learning computer science through the free online class. The lectures and assignments are broken up so anyone can learn from it.

# How To Get Started (Just 15 minutes for you to get started)

* All the course materials are online and free! 
* Some of the software listed on the course page is not up to date, so if you have a newer computer, make sure you get newer version.
* You just have to make contribution. (HOW??? :scream: ) 
* Get started, make your contribution to the open world using [git](https://git-scm.com/)
     1. Get `git` on your favorite platform. 
     2. Learn `github` basics. [This](https://training.github.com/) link is enough.
     3. Make your first repository.
     4. Fork and make contributions to the institute :smiley: 
     5. Be a part of our team. Send us a pull request :+1: 
Follow the [instructions.](https://github.com/nitb/CSE-III-/wiki/Setup) properly.

-----
The initiative of this is to introduce people with open source technologies and help them to share and learn new things easily. Here you are a man of value and just learn for your excellence. Where you are away from crappy teachers and crappy shit called 'grades' (90's thing) lol. Feel free to express yourself :smiley: You are bright!




### Authors and Contributors
-Barun (@switchkiller)

### Support or Contact
-Barun (emailbarung@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
